name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 0 Code 0 (echo-Reply) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on egress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 0 Code 0 (echo-Reply) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on ingress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 8 Code 0 (echo) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on egress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: istio_nodes
business_justification: Allow Type 8 Code 0 (echo) from istio_nodes to other istio_nodes on ingress for troubleshooting connectivity.

name: app_nodes
business_justification: App nodes need HTTPS egress to API Gateway in same VPC.

name: api_gateway
business_justification: Allow ingress from app nodes SG for HTTPS service responses.
